typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SaleDate as string,
		SalesItem as string,
		Country as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull(toDate(SaleDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(ErrorRows, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplit@ErrorRows derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
